original_text: And the Lord shall be seen over them, and his arrow shall go forth as the lightning: and the Lord God shall blow the trumpet, and shall go with whirlwinds of the south.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그들 위에 나타나서 그들의 화살을 번개 같이 쏘아내실 것이며 주 여호와께서 나팔을 불게 하시며 남방 회오리바람을 타고 가실 것이라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord shall be seen over them
and his arrow shall go forth as the lightning
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 화살이 번개 같이 나아갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the Lord God shall blow the trumpet
and shall go with whirlwinds of the south
